Press Again To Exit The Program
Message Wechat
User Agreement And Privacy Policy Thank you for trusting and using FitRing. \n\n We will help you to understand our collection, use and storage of your personal information and your relevant rights according to the User Privacy Agreement. \n\n When you use the FitRing app, we will collect your device information, personal information (avatar, nickname, height, weight, exercise data) and other information. We need to get your camera permissions, photo album permissions to upload your app avatar: \n\n When you use the FitRing application to run outdoors, upload, share and store exercise information, we need to obtain your location permissions and other purposes to record your running track. \n\n You can access, modify, delete your personal information or manage your authorization in the relevant pages. \n\n We use industry-leading security technology to protect your personal information. \n\n When you click "OK", you agree to the terms of this Agreement.

FAQ Your feedback/question Send Input is too long Field cannot be empty Feedback Success User Guide Keep app active HUAWEI oppo vivo Lenovo onePlus Samsun MI MEIZU In order to improve the stability of the watch connection, it is recommended that you make the following Settings: Do not open (power saving mode) : If the power-saving mode is turned on, it may cause problems such as unstable Bluetooth connection, abnormal movement trajectory and reduced power distance. It is recommended to turn off the power-saving mode while in use. Set the method of background protection::
Search Device Searching for device.... binding... No device found Pair success Your exercise and health data will be synchronized between the watch and the phone through the APP. Finish Understand Wear Tip In order to accurately measure data and not affect the normal use of APP, please try to wear the watch 1cm away from the wrist bone Remove the device, charge it to activate, and hold it close to the phone Please select your watch by MAC address Search Again You can perform the following operations and try again: · Turn on the bluetooth of the phone again \n· Make sure that the watch is turned on and close to the phone \ N · Click on the device \" Restore factory Settings \" Later, it is not bound Can\'t find the device to add? See the help

With Bluetooth enabled, the watch controls the phone\'s camera app to take photos. In the process of using, this application requires access to the camera and file read and write permissions, used for remote photography and storage photos. You can go to Settings at any time; Permission Management, choose to close the above permission call to revoke your consent. Permission failed to open
Confirm to cancel your account, the account will be successfully cancelled within three days after the confirmation, the account data will be completely deleted and cannot be restored! Perform this operation with caution. The request is successful. The current account is awaiting destruction.
